activities: Secret, Inc. (“Secret”) collects and processes personally identifiable information that is voluntarily submitted by users of the Secret mobile application and website in order for Secret to provide social media services to users; to provide users with services they request; to respond to user inquiries; to maintain business records for reasonable periods; for customer support and customer relationship management purposes; and for human resources purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer and employee data which may be manually processed.
recoursemech: cooperation with EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
